snippet.title: Cosmic Cursor - Release Date Trailer
snippet.description:
Cosmic Cursor fuses simple mouse-based controls with a challenging, reactive bullet hell for the ultimate pick-up-and-play roguelike experience.


Play the Cosmic Cursor Demo Here:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2611750/Cosmic_Cursor/


#Gamedev #indiedev #steam #gameplay #announcement #gamedev #demo #gaming #gamplay #CosmicCursor
